```{r}
'
{

  "transform": [{"calculate": "datum.date", "as": "year"}],
  "title": {"text": ""},

  "encoding": {
    "x": { 
      "field": "date",

    }, 
    "y": {
      "field": "temp_max",
      "type": "quantitative",
      "title": "Power Generated"
    },
    "detail": {
    }
  }
}
' %>% as_vegaspec()
```
